item.title: EMBL - Reconstructing the Human Past 2019
item.description: ADD THE ONE WITH FOUR SCENARIOS AFRICA https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28196867 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/25156276 Bruner endocasts https://doi.org/10.26879/805 Xia J, Gill E, & Hancock REW (2015). NetworkAnalyst for Statistical, Visual and Network-based Approaches for Meta-analysis of Expression Data. Nature Protocols 10, 823–844 https://doi.org/10.1038/nprot.2015.052 Peyrégne, S, et al. Detecting Ancient Positive Selection in Humans Using Extended Lineage Sorting. Genome Research, vol. 27, no. 9, Sept. 2017, pp. 1563–72. https://doi.10.1101/gr.219493.116. Racimo, F. “Testing for Ancient Selection Using Cross-Population Allele Frequency Differentiation.
